metadata.Title: CVE-2017-10966 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Irssi before 1.0.4. While updating the internalnick list, Irssi could incorrectly use the GHashTable interface and freethe nick while updating it. This would then result in use-after-freeconditions on each access of the hash table.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10966` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: irssi package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.5').
